summary: Most requested onboarding + credential persistence, header greeting, Nutritionix-first nutrition lookup, and env example cleanup appear implemented. The diff also includes several unrelated UI/layout tweaks and new maintenance docs/scripts not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Added clean rebuild/redeploy tooling and documentation (script + multiple docs/checklists) not requested in the BuildRequest.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on onboarding/API provider changes; no requirement mentions build scripts or redeploy documentation.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced/updated a 720×1600 constrained 'app-canvas' layout and related global style/theme changes not requested.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not ask for layout resizing, canvas constraints, or a new neon OKLCH design system.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified bottom navigation structure (e.g., removing a tab) beyond the scope of onboarding/API settings changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not ask to change navigation tabs; only to gate access until onboarding is complete.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/expanded local nutrition and exercise databases (Indian nutrition DB, Mevsa DB/exercise lists) beyond what was requested.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-4 allows existing local fallbacks, but does not request adding large new datasets/modules.

hallucinated_features.description: Created an empty placeholder hook file (useQueries.ts) not tied to any requirement.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement asks for adding placeholder hooks or restructuring query logic.
